H0.text: Which Shakespeare play is set in the Forest of Arden. As You Like It

H1.text: Which Shakespeare play is set in the Forest of Arden. A Midsummer Night's Dream

H2.text: Which Shakespeare play is set in the Forest of Arden. The Tempest

H3.text: Which Shakespeare play is set in the Forest of Arden. Martext

A4.text: Shakespeare's play As You Like It is set in the Forest of Arden, but it is an imaginary version incorporating elements from the Ardennes forest in Thomas Lodge's prose romance Rosalynde; Or, Euphues' Golden Legacy and the real forest
